lines.text: Well, if we get that pentagram cleaned up, I could set up a-
-demonic ritual to call up the corpse's ghost? No.
Hey, c'mon! I wouldn't try and summon his ghost!
That wouldn't work, anyway. People don't leave ghosts, unless they go out of their way to set that up for themselves.
I'd just summon a demon from the Wasting Reaches of the Mindplains to tell me the name of-
...Uh, you didn't set up that ghost thing for yourself, did you?
